details: An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiOS 7.6.0 through 7.6.3, 7.4.0 through 7.4.7, 7.2 all versions, 7.0 all versions, 6.4 all versions; FortiProxy 7.6.0 through 7.6.3, 7.4.0 through 7.4.9, 7.2 all versions, 7.0 all versions; FortiSASE 25.3.a may allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform a reflected cross site scripting (XSS) via crafted HTTP requests.
